headlines.description: Frank Lampard earned his first win as Chelsea manager after seeing his side overcome Norwich 3-2 on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Abraham double hands Lampard first win

headlines.description: Southampton collected their first Premier League points of the season with a 2-0 victory over 10-man Brighton & Hove Albion.
headlines.shortLinkText: Southampton off the mark with win over 10-man Brighton

headlines.description: Manchester United suffered a shock 2-1 defeat against Crystal Palace at Old Trafford due to a injury time mistake from David de Gea.
headlines.shortLinkText: Rashford misses penalty as Palace stun United

headlines.description: Harvey Barnes thrashed home a magnificent strike to earn Leicester City a 2-1 win on the road on Saturday while rudely ending Sheffield United's bri
headlines.shortLinkText: Barnes strike for Foxes ends Sheffield Utd's bright start

headlines.description: Record signing Sebastien Haller scored a tap-in and a superb bicycle kick for West Ham as they beat Watford 3-1.
headlines.shortLinkText: Haller double gives Hammers 3-1 win over Watford

headlines.description: Mohamed Salah scored twice as Liverpool cruised to a 3-1 victory over Arsenal at Anfield on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Salah brace beats Arsenal, keeps Reds perfect
